page.title: 17DALLAM SCHOOL
page.content: Each year about 100 boys and girls enter the First Year and,when we include the Sixth Form,our total role is up to 700 pupils.With about 45 well qualified teachers and an experienced ancillary staff (caring for the school's administration,its buildings and grounds,its welfare and catering services) Dallam provides a wide curriculum and a caring enviroment. Given our fine facilities and enviable location,Dallam's reputation is sure to prosper. Dallam School is under the headship of Mr.John.D.Barker, B.A.(Hons),Cert.Ed.
